## Matrix.Translation() method

Creates a translation matrix

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
static Translation(x: number, y: number, z: number): Matrix;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  x | <code>number</code> | defines the translation on X axis |
|  y | <code>number</code> | defines the translation on Y axis |
|  z | <code>number</code> | defines the translationon Z axis |

<b>Returns:</b>

`Matrix`

the new matrix
